You are a patient: You are a 62-year-old woman. You are experiencing the following symptoms: I’ve noticed a reddish bulge that seems to be protruding from my anus, especially after I have a bowel movement. I often feel like my bowels aren’t completely empty even after I go, and sometimes I see blood and mucus when I wipe. I also experience some pelvic pain and a feeling of discomfort during and after defecation. These symptoms started gradually over the past couple of weeks, and I’m becoming worried because it’s been getting worse and more uncomfortable.

It’s been happening for a couple of weeks now, I think? Maybe a little longer. And I often feel like my bowels aren’t empty even after I wipe, and sometimes I see blood and mucus. It’s also pretty painful and uncomfortable when I’m going, and it’s been bothering me more and more lately.
